title: Traffic Bootstrap Campaign - LinkedIn Ads Setup (dnsscience.io)
description:
Set up and launch LinkedIn paid advertising campaign for dnsscience.io targeting DevOps and Security professionals.

## Budget
- Total: $300
- Daily: $20/day
- Duration: 15 days

## Ad Sets
1. **Visibility Play** - "Your DNS Is a Black Box. We Fix That."
2. **Security Angle** - "DNS Attacks Start With Queries You Can't See"

## Targeting
- Job Titles: DevOps Engineer, SRE, IT Admin, Network Engineer, Security Engineer, CISO
- Company Size: 50-5000 employees
- Skills: DNS, Kubernetes, AWS, Cloud Infrastructure, Terraform

## Success Metrics
- Target CAC: < $8
- Target signups: 40+
- Target CTR: > 0.3%
acceptance_criteria: LinkedIn Insight Tag installed on dnsscience.io
2 ad campaigns created with proper targeting
testing_plan:
1. Verify Insight Tag firing
2. Confirm ads approved
3. Day 3 review: CTR > 0.2%, adjust targeting if needed
4. Week 1 review: Calculate CAC, scale or pause
rollback_plan: Pause campaign if CAC exceeds $20 after 7 days
